title: Hardhat network helper not working
body:
I have the following on one of my scripts:

```
import { latest } from "@nomicfoundation/hardhat-network-helpers/dist/src/helpers/time";
import { BigNumber } from "ethers";
import { ethers } from "hardhat";

// getting future timestamp
async function getFutureTimestamp(addSeconds: number): Promise<number> {
  const value = await latest();
  const added = value + addSeconds;
  return added;
}
```

This was working perfectly but all of a sudden if I want to run the script doing `yarn hardhat run scripts/initialDeploy.ts --network localhost`, it throws the error: "OnlyHardhatNetworkError: This helper can only be used with Hardhat Network. You are connected to 'localhost'.\n"

However, if I run `yarn hardhat run scripts/initialDeploy.ts` and it runs in hardhat network it deploys, but all of my tests fail. 

What could be happening? Your help is much appreciated!
